Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed all your expectations. This exceptional item offers unparalleled quality, functionality, and aesthetics that make it a true masterpiece. We believe its value far surpasses $800000, but we are extending this exclusive opportunity to you at this extraordinary price. By accepting this offer, you will not only acquire an item of great value but also join an elite group of distinguished owners who appreciate its unique qualities. Please consider this proposal carefully, and should you have any questions or require further information, do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $800,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $800,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
